# Accessing Indicies Within an Attributed String

**API Collection**

Access a position within an attributed string, offset from the beginning, or before or after another known position.

## Supporting Types

- **AttributedString.Index**: A type that represents the position of a character or code unit within an attributed string.

items.description: A type that represents the position of a character or code unit within an attributed string.
items.name: AttributedString.Index
